FuncDef: This command configures the watermarks used to determine if a new prefix should be allocated or an old prefix should be removed. A new prefix is allocated when the total usage level for the ISA reaches the high watermark. A prefix is freed if no addresses are currently in use and the usage level without this prefix would be below the low watermark.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the high watermark. Values-80 to 99.
Specifies the low watermark. The value must be lower than the high percentage value. Values-50 to 98.
